text: Pamela Vezey (19 September 1932, Bath, Somerset - 18 June 1992)https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0895537/?ref_=rvi_nm was an English actress best known for her roles as Kath Brownlow in Crossroads and as the mother of Carol and Trisha Yates in the children's television series Grange Hill. She died of cancer in 1992. ==Television credits== {| class= "wikitable" ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
